values.value:
• I am an Australian Tax Resident.
  • I have read and understood the Salary Sacrifice Policy and agree to abide by the provisions which may be varied from time to time.
  • I understand that Woolworths is required to make a superannuation contribution equivalent to the super guaranteed amount of any taxable income payment I may receive from MyIncentive, up to the maximum super contribution base as per ATO legislation.
  • In addition, I would like Woolworths to make a pre-tax contribution into my superannuation for the percentage nominated in my application in place of any payment that I may become eligible to receive in cash, in relation to the Full Year MyIncentive I am nominating for.
  • I understand that the standard tax amount will be deducted from the superannuation contribution and if my total concessional contributions exceed the concessional contributions cap for the financial year as per current legislation I will incur additional tax on my superannuation contributions.
